name: schematox

scripts.formatter:check: prettier --check . || (echo "FORMATTING ERROR: use 'npm run formatter:fix'" && exit 1)
scripts.check: npm run formatter:check && npm run ts && npm run test:coverage
scripts.version:patch: npm run check && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: npm run check && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: npm run check && npm version major

description: Define JSON compatible schema statically/programmatically and parse its subject with typesafety
author: Kanstantsin Mazur
